programme.desc: Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Scallop is afraid of her first “tuskist” appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelp’s first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. When Scooch outshines Tag with his natural gift for magic, Tag gets jealous and attempts a master level trick that goes awry. \ The dogs are shedding their winter coats and it's the day of the big Pawston Picnic. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.desc: A self-proclaimed rational drinker who got diagnosed with alcohol dependency reunites with her alcohol-hating first love and takes on a sobriety challenge in this romance.

programme.desc: A former champion martial artist struggles to find and seeks revenge on those responsible for her sister's disappearance.

programme.title: The Hunter's Prayer

programme.desc: Three lighthouse keepers on the remote Flannan Isles find a hidden trunk of gold that becomes the catalyst to a struggle for survival

programme.title: Remember

programme.title: The Master (Jet Li)
programme.desc: A former Chinese Kung Fu master working in L.A. as a medicine man is targeted by an ex-student, and it's up to one of his Hong Kong disciples, who's visiting America, to defend his master's honor.

programme.title: Dreamland
programme.desc: A teenager's adventures as a bounty hunter take an unexpected twist.

programme.title: Dew
programme.desc: Pop and Dew are friends who study at the same school but slowly realize, that there might be something more than friendship between them. Unfortunately, they live in an era which isn't open to homosexuals and thus the two get separated only to meet 23 years later.

programme.title: America In Color S3
programme.desc: Witness historic disasters in vivid color. The Hindenburg crash, the San Francisco earthquake, the Galveston hurricane, and the tri-state tornado are a handful of calamities that slammed America and became crucial events that shaped the nation.

programme.desc: Visit America during the heart of the Klondike Gold Rush. See Alaska’s evolution from a frozen wasteland to becoming the 49th state. From boomtowns to volcanic blasts to Japanese invasions, this is the story of America’s last frontier.

programme.title: Guess with Jess

By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Captain Jean Luc-Picard and the crew of the newly commissioned Enterprise E battle the insidious Borg to restore the rightful future of Earth.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
programme.desc: A generation's final journey begins when Captain Picard and the crew of the Enterprise encounter a monstrous alien race known as the Remans. Picard and his crew must risk everything to prevent this sinister villain from destroying Earth.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

programme.title: Doom: Annihilation
programme.desc: Based on the popular original video game, Doom: Annihilation is an explosive, terrifying thrill ride.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Welcome To Sudden Death
programme.desc: A former special forces officer working as a security guard battles a group of terrorists after they take hostages inside a basketball arena.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: After chimps infected with a deadly rage virus are freed, a global pandemic nearly wipes out humanity. A small group of survivors, led by Jim (Cillian Murphy), must navigate desolate London and find hope amidst the chaos.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The 6th Day
programme.desc: In a future where cloning is common, a corporation illegally clones humans. They mistakenly duplicate the wrong man, who now must evade assassination and reclaim his life.

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.desc: In this most colorful and relaxed installment of Paramount's longest running series, Captain Picard leads his multicultural starship crew in a rebellion to save a planet from the very Federation they serve so proudly.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop (S2)

programme.title: How Do They Do It? (S14)
programme.desc: 'How Do They Do It?' puts more everyday items under the microscope to explain the technology, designs and processes behind how they are made.

programme.title: How It's Made (S13)
programme.desc: On this episode of How It's Made, we'll see how precast concrete walls, 3D printers, telescopic cranes, and kerosene lamp burners are made.

programme.title: Man Vs. Wild (S6)
programme.desc: Bear Grylls shows viewers how to survive the toughest and most remote environments on the planet by putting himself in the position of a stranded tourist.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: KBS WORLD News Today
programme.desc: KBS World Daily English News Anchor : Choi Kyu-yeon

programme.title: My Only One
programme.desc: A woman's life gets twisted one day because of her biological father who shows up after 28 years of absence. He had been thoroughly hiding his identity, afraid that he might be an obstacle in his daughter's life. The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives and put back together the pieces of their broken hearts.

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Ppang Car Road 2
programme.desc: From Seoul to Busan, this spectacular eating show takes place at famous bakeries/patisseries to give the dessert lovers the glimpse of tasty goodness of some of the most-coveted desserts of all.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S16)
programme.desc: The top five cooks will get the chance to cook in the first immunity challenge and avoid the first elimination. But first, Sofia has set them the challenge of making a dish that the judges cannot resist.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: You may not know that you've been eating tonkatsu for years. Let Rachael reintroduce you to her version of the dish, also known as fried pork chops, served with an umami-rich sauce.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy visits two generational legacies - family owned and operated Patsy's Italian Restaurant in New York City and the famed Oaxacan joint in Los Angeles, Guelaguetza.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics
programme.desc: Chefs spoon up their favourite twists on scrumptious soups in these twisted takes on soup staples. These delicious twists will make you rethink your favorite soup classics.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics
programme.desc: There's nothing like home cooking, but these aren't your Mama's dishes. Talented chefs are taking their favourite mom-made recipes and adding their own tasty twists and turns.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael is taking a traditional ballpark sausage sandwich to the next level. Her recipe calls for seasoned, bone-in pork chops cooked on an iron skillet, with fennel, peppers, onions and red wine.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael shows us how to whip up a French country-inspired, tangy, creamy chicken dinner with vinegar and tarragon, served with a simple salad and a baguette with soft butter.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: It's the penultimate commitment ceremony and, while some couples are going from strength to strength, two couples will leave the experiment - and their marriages - for good.

programme.title: Danger In The House

programme.title: Squad Goals
programme.desc: Five boys finds connection in each other while dealing with school, love and family problems.

programme.title: Revirginized
programme.desc: Carmela (Sharon Cuneta) gets to enjoy life again in a wild beach party. With young people and a hunk tattoo artist, she drowns herself in alcohol to forget her current self and renew her old self.

programme.title: Para Sa Broken Hearted
programme.desc: Three interweaving stories of broken hearts, that tackle the pain of heartbreak, acceptance, moving on and the courage to learn to love again.

programme.title: Gluta
programme.desc: An Aeta dreams of winning the Miss University pageant but faces discrimination from people - including her own uncle who does not believe that people like them are beautiful.

programme.title: Basta Ikaw... Nanginginig Pa
programme.desc: Enteng (Vic Sotto) has long been looking for the right girl, it seems that he doesn’t have much luck at it. Disappointed, he decides to join his cousin in Manila where he meets Selya (Rosanna Roces), his cousin’s landlady.

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A prolific killer-for-hire finds solace and redemption after rescuing a teenage girl who was held captive by the man she was paid to kill.

programme.title: Double Barrel
programme.desc: A young impoverished couple work as hired killers.

programme.title: Binhi
programme.desc: Daniel (Joem Bascon) and Cynthia (Mercedes Cabral), a young couple with a child on the way, head back to Baguio to start over again. Everything seems to be falling into place for them - or so they think - until strange things start to happen in their house.

programme.title: Ikaw Pa Rin, Bongga Ka Boy!
programme.desc: Baby is a veterinarian who bumps into a heroic fireman named Boy. Will this lead to a more serious relationship between the two people or will they continue to be unlucky in love?

programme.title: When The Love Is Gone
programme.desc: The movie is a remake of the 1983 blockbuster movie directed by Danny Zialcita entitled Nagalit ang Buwan sa Haba ng Gabi. A gripping, moving story of love lost, love gained, love betrayed, and love unbound.

programme.title: Ben Delubyo
programme.desc: After his dismissal from the police force due to insubordination, Ben (Bong Revilla, Jr.) decides to lead a quiet life as a mechanic. But just as he is beginning to enjoy his new-found peace, his hometown is beleaguered by crimes. To help contain the problems before they are blown into unimaginable proportions, a PNP general orders a police lieutenant (Charlene Gonzales) to get him back. Indeed, he returns, but this time, as a vigilante. Ironically, his most important assignment is to collar a notorious drug lord (Ronaldo Valdez) who happens to be the father of his girlfriend (Aileen Damiles). Now, Ben is torn between protecting the woman he loves or upholding the law.

programme.title: Itutumba Ka ng Tatay Ko
programme.desc: Teteng (Janno Gibbs), a single father and assistant to a film director, faces his last days due to a brain tumor. Despite his fear of confrontation, he becomes determined to protect his daughter from bullies.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: Seven years after his failed assassination and murder of his family, Ben (Cesar Montano) seeks revenge on Mando (Ricky Davao), master of drug syndicate and white slavery.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S4 E06 - They Do It With Mirrors (Part 2)
programme.desc: Julia McKenzie perfectly captures Agatha Christie’s iconic amateur detective - and the innocent exterior which harbours a razor- sharp mind.

programme.title: CSI S4 E12 - Butterflied
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: ALF S2 E01 - Working My Way Back to You
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E22 - The Life of the Party
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: The Waltons S2 E05 - The Roots
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: ALF S2 E02 - Ballad of Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E23 - Party Party
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: CSI S4 E13 - Suckers
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S4 E03 - Deep Shock
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: North And South Book I E02 - Episode 1 (Part 2)
programme.desc: 1842. Two West Point military academy cadets form a bond of friendship strong enough to survive the forces leading to the United States' Civil War--forces that will rip their country into North and South

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S14)
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens has investigated the world's oldest and most incredible relics up close and in person. Now, Giorgio Tsoukalos takes a look back at the most mysterious artefacts from all over the globe.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: The Center for the Study of Extra-Terrestrial Intelligence defines a "Close Encounter of The Fifth Kind" as direct human contact and communication with extraterrestrial life.

programme.title: Alone: Frozen (S1)
programme.desc: Frost arrives and changes the landscape, creating new obstacles for the participants. Some deal with the consequences of a diet with no diversity, while others battle with major shelter issues.

programme.title: Alone (S11)
programme.desc: As the survivalists enter the second week of the competition, new challenges and opportunities arise while they battle to maintain focus. One survivalist gets another chance at the shot of a lifetime.

programme.title: Swamp People: Serpent Invasion (S3)
programme.desc: On the last day of the season, the hunters gather to target breeding females. Bill and Tes investigate a secluded stretch of islands. Dusty hopes to go out with a bang.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Tom instructs young Hank on some essential Mountain Man skills. Newlyweds Jake and Anika hunt elk in the bone-chilling cold while Paul takes on an infestation of nuisance badgers.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: The team is ecstatic when new scientific evidence narrows down the location of the gold signature in the Money Pit. Rick realises a lifelong dream when he finally goes underground on Oak Island.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: A cold front threatens to freeze up gator season. Troy looks for warm waters to save the day. Don mixes up a special juice to lure big gators. Joey and Zak bet everything on a set of open flood gates.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: The team launches an incredible nighttime 200-drone light show experiment above the Triangle and the East Field leading to a startling sighting in the sky and new data that points toward possible answers.

programme.desc: The team launches an incredible nighttime 200-drone light show experiment above the Triangle and the East Field leading to a startling sighting in the sky and new data that points toward possible answers.

programme.title: Alone: Frozen (S1)
programme.desc: Frost arrives and changes the landscape, creating new obstacles for the participants. Some deal with the consequences of a diet with no diversity, while others battle with major shelter issues.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Tom instructs young Hank on some essential Mountain Man skills. Newlyweds Jake and Anika hunt elk in the bone-chilling cold while Paul takes on an infestation of nuisance badgers.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: A cold front threatens to freeze up gator season. Troy looks for warm waters to save the day. Don mixes up a special juice to lure big gators. Joey and Zak bet everything on a set of open flood gates.

programme.title: Alone (S11)
programme.desc: As the survivalists enter the second week of the competition, new challenges and opportunities arise while they battle to maintain focus. One survivalist gets another chance at the shot of a lifetime.

programme.title: Bad Boy (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This was the landmark film that launched Robin Padilla to stardom as one of the biggest action stars in the Philippine cinema. Robin played a young man branded as "bad boy" for life because as a kid he killed his father in defense of his mother.

programme.title: Pinagbiyak Na Bunga (Lookalayk)
programme.desc: Watching Andrew E and Chiquito together as they play the parts of con-men who might indeed be father and son.

programme.title: Working Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A humorous, but truly insightful look into the lives of women trying to make a living in the big city and coping with all the prejudice life bestowed on them because of their sex. This is also about their loves, their dreams, their weaknesses.

programme.title: Kahit Wala Ka Na
programme.desc: Love triangles will always be with us as long as romantic melodramas are made for the screen. The latest trio are Sharon Cuneta, Richard Gomez and TonTon Gutierrez. Sharon plays Irene, the wife torn between two men.

programme.title: Regalo
programme.desc: Tragedy had struck newlyweds, Daniel Fernando and Sheila Ysrael, when Daniel was paralyzed. Sheila was soon seduced by Dan Fernadez, a household help.

programme.title: Itanong Mo Sa Buwan
programme.desc: Josie is not really a victim but Angelito's lover. He then declares they planned the whole thing to finance a new life together. Who is telling the truth?

programme.title: Libingan Ng Mga Buhay
programme.desc: This is the true story of Rodolfo Fuentes who was unjustly sent to jail at the very young age of 14.

programme.title: Bakit May Kahapon Pa?
programme.desc: Award-winning actress Nora Aunor turned in one of her finest performances as Helen, a survivor.

programme.title: Pati Ba Pintig ng Puso? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia was at his best as the autocratic patriarch who ruled his family and all the people around him with an iron hand. But his grandson would have none of this.

programme.title: Cuadro De Jack
programme.desc: Young comedians Nino, Keempee, Dennis and Smokey starred in this 90's remake of a blockbuster hit. The Filipino version of the cowboy and Indians war made all the more appealing by the laugh-filled sequences featuring the inept, but trying hard bunch of heroes.

programme.title: Pieta 2
programme.desc: Rigor (Ace Vergel) dies but in Marta's fear that Noel (Bong Revilla Jr) might turn out like his amoral father, she raises her son with an iron hand.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod 2 (Da Treasure Adbentyur)
programme.desc: The Dineros and the Dayukdoks, were off on a treasure hunt where they met the crazy professor Hannibal, a forgetful ghost, a tribe of midgets, a troop of sexy women from the moon and other fantasy figures.

programme.title: Uubusin Ko Ang Lahi Mo
programme.desc: The canonigos led by Mayor Placido (Eddie Gutierrez) have enjoyed sole political control of the town for sometime now. But their abusive reign is threatened when Fortunato Guerrero (Robert Arevalo) plans to enter the political arena in the coming elections. The Guerrero and Canonigo clans both vow to eliminate the each other.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: KABUKI KOOL
programme.desc: Love for family and romance are central themes in the story of many female characters in kabuki. Studio guest and Onnagata actor Nakamura Kazutaro reveals techniques he uses on stage.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Science View
programme.desc: Discover how eels navigate 3,000 km in the vast ocean without getting lost. Also find out about a new technology that can share physical sensations.

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7
programme.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers

programme.title: Dive in Tokyo
programme.desc: Tokyo: where both tradition and the latest trends coexist. Join us on a journey to historic old towns and encounter many fun surprises along the way.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: In 2023, Okada Nozomi became the first Japanese person to win a gold medal at the World Logging Championship. She talks about achieving the feat just six years after first picking up a chainsaw.

programme.title: IMPACTS:Climates Change the World
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE(4)
programme.desc: With its splendid branches and white plum blossoms, this famous painting is known for captivating Van Gogh. Discover why people were able to tell this was a specific tree at Kameido Umeyashiki.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Asakawa Chieko develops innovative products that transform the lives of the visually impaired. Asakawa, who is blind herself, introduces her greatest project yet: an AI suitcase.

programme.title: JAPAN'S TOP INVENTIONS
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: heat-resistant labels.

programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.desc: On a fishing trip Sharkdog meets a Great White Shark and Max fears he'll lose his best friend to his wild instincts.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbidur is no longer a baby, he's a big boy now! The barbababies are going to the hypermarket for the first time.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbidou's beautiful roses mysteriously disappeared during the night. Barbapapa decides to tell the barbababies about the time he went to explore the Arctic and the seabed.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally! The time has come for Aunt Lucy to go home.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol must save the day when two helpful robots take on more than they can handle. In a dream, Mayor Humdinger finds a Prism that makes rainbows and drains Adventure Bay of color.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol springs into action when a digging machine goes out-of-control and takes Uncle Otis on a wild ride.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Chucks is great at giving out new nicknames, but Baby likes the name he has already.

Our cast of souped-up comedians, including Kevin McCaffrey, Chris Fairbanks, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Trainor have pulled up to the curb with plenty to say.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 8
programme.desc: Our buyers bid big to win a locker packed with what looks like rare art, but will the winner walk away with cash or counterfeits? Then, a dumpy unit sends almost everyone running, but Papa Bear spies a profit. And later, the day's final auction contains expensive looking sky-diving equipment that ignites a sky-high bidding war. But when the dust settles, the winner will unveil a hidden gem that spells a five-figure payday.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 9
programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? Then, the legality of a locker's contents is called into question, but Brandon and Lori take a leap of faith and are rattled by what they find. And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: Basketball Boo Boo
programme.desc: Gecko’s Garage is the repair shop that cares. Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko and his trusty robot sidekicks, The Mechanicals, the garage takes care of all the vehicles in town and keeps them running smoothly. Whether it’s fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle that’s stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: It's Time To Sing Along With JJ!
programme.desc: It's song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating life's big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: Fun and Dance With JJ and Friends
programme.desc: JJ and all the Melon Patch children dance to their favorite nursery rhymes on the CoComelon stage. All their animals friends dance along, why don’t you join in too?

programme.title: Time To Play

programme.title: Baby Race!!
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moment’s notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Danny’s curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.desc: Gecko’s Garage is the repair shop that cares. programme.title: This Place - Bobbinawarra

programme.title: Way Out Ag - Jujube We Do!
programme.desc: Jujubes have been grown in Asia for thousands of years but are relatively new to Australia. Some inventive farmers in South Australia's Riverland are now even turning it into vinegar and beer, as Landline reported in 2020.

programme.desc: Dr Aileen Moreton-Robinson explains the cultural importance and recent devastation of Minjerribah's Lake Burmeer, also known as Brown Lake on North Stradbroke Island.

programme.title: The Future Proofers
programme.desc: Cyclones and rising sea levels are destroying the coastal cities of Surabaya and Chennai. Follow the trailblazing leaders and locals working to save their cities from these looming threats.

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.
